headlines.description: Manchester United made a dramatic late comeback to defeat rivals Manchester City 2-1 at Old Trafford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rashford seals controversial derby win for Utd

headlines.description: Liverpool’s hopes of Champions League qualification took a blow after it was thrashed at Brighton 3-0 on Saturday.

headlines.shortLinkText: Lampard takes responsibility for dismal Everton defeat

headlines.description: A double from Brennan Johnson earned Nottingham Forest a 2-0 win over Leicester, pulling them five points clear of the relegation zone.
headlines.shortLinkText: Forest pull clear of relegation zone with win over Leicester

events.name: West Ham United at Wolverhampton Wanderers

headlines.description: — Daniel Podence's goal secured a 1-0 win for Wolverhampton Wanderers against fellow relegation struggler West Ham on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolverhampton beats West Ham 1-0 in relegation fight

headlines.shortLinkText: Brentford ease to 2-0 win over Bournemouth
